reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress comfortable, well-fitting, and appreciate its pretty pattern and slick polyester fabric.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Finally, A Maxi Dress That Understands Curves! (Detailed Fit Review)
items.body: : Yes As a curvy woman (5'2", 215 lbs) with significant hips and thighs, finding a maxi dress that fits both my waist and my curves without looking like a tent or being too short is a constant struggle. This Runwind dress is a rare and wonderful exception. I am absolutely thrilled with it. Fit & Comfort (The Big Win!): I ordered my usual size based on the size chart, and it fit perfectly. The magic is in the cut. It has just the right amount of stretch in the fabric to accommodate my hips without being tight or restrictive. The waist is defined but not constricting, and the skirt flows beautifully away from the body, skimming over my hips and thighs rather than clinging to them. Itâ€™s incredibly comfortable to wear and move in. For my fellow "hippy" big girls: this dress gets it. You will feel supported and flattered, not squeezed. Fabric & Quality: The fabric is a mid-weight jersey that feels soft and durable. Itâ€™s opaqueâ€”no need for a slip, which is a huge plus. The material has enough structure to hold its shape all day but enough stretch to be forgiving. The POCKETS! This was the deal-closer for me. The side pockets are deep, functional, and perfectly placed. They don't drag the dress down or look bulky. I can comfortably hold my phone, lipstick, and even my hands without worrying about anything falling out. Itâ€™s such a practical and thoughtful feature that so many dresses lack. Style & Details: The design is elegant and modest without being frumpy. The sleeves are a perfect length, the neckline is classic, and I was pleasantly surprised that the length was a true maxi on my 5'2" frameâ€”it hit right at the top of my feet. Itâ€™s a versatile piece that feels both stylish and appropriate for a formal setting. The stitching is even and secure, and it came out of the wash looking brand new (I followed the cold wash/tumble dry low instructions). Final Thoughts: This dress is a home run. It solved the classic curvy-girl problem with grace, style, and POCKETS! Itâ€™s well-made, comfortable, and truly flattering. If youâ€™ve been hesitant to try a maxi dress for fear of fit issues, this is the one to take a chance on. I followed the size chart precisely, and it worked perfectly for me. I will definitely be buying this in other colors. Highly, highly recommend Read more
items.author: Team Bennett

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great fit and quality
items.body: Bought this dress for a last minute holiday family photo. Beyond my expectations. Very flattering, very comfortable, has pockets, stretchy fabric that washed well and donâ€™t need to be ironed (pulled from dryer and hung immediately). Highly recommend, you wonâ€™t be disappointed. Ordered small, I am 5â€™4â€ (length is perfect) 120 lbs. Read more

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty pattern and style, fit was off for my body
items.body: Loved the look of this dress, the fabric and all. Was just too big on the bottom & made it look off. The upper 1/2 was great, maybe a bit big. The lower 1/2, where the dress tied, was just too big or too much fabric and it did not tie well. So it looked like it was very loose. Had to return it unfortunately, was very hopeful! Read more
items.author: Kory

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Quality
items.body: I was pleasantly surprised with the item. Very good quality material and it fit so well. Read more
items.author: Johnnel Adderley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the weight and feel!
items.body: I absolutely love this dress! The weight of the fabric and bold color take this a wonderful choice for many occasions. I received many compliments!! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Should have bought it sooner!
items.body: Canâ€™t say enough good about this dress!! It fits well, has a nice stretch, not see through and is very comfortable, not too tight across my larger bust, buttons do not gap, it has pockets (need I say more!?) ðŸ˜‚ the fabric doesnâ€™t wrinkle easily and it was just long enough for my 5 foot five height. I ordered the large and it fits perfect. I highly recommend this dress. Iâ€™m currently looking to get a second one in another color. Read more
items.author: A. Duncan

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable
items.body: I'm 5'7" and 210lb. I generally wear 18 or 2x tops and 18/20 or 3x bottoms. I purchased the solid yellow in size 3x. The fit was good. The shoulder width is excellent for my wide shoulders. The arms are comfortably slightly loose on my bat wings. The buttons lay flat and closed, no gapping or pulling (40DD). The bodice length could be a few inches longer, after my bust takes up space. The seam line hovers bellow bust level, but not at my waist. I choose not to use the matching fabric belt. Instead, I use a wide, patterned scarf as a belt and use small safety pins to hold it covering the seam location. The skirt has plenty of space for free movement, not body skimming. The length on me is s at my ankle.(5'7") If you are at far end of height either way consider if this will work for you. The fabric is a nice, breathable mid weight. I have no trouble with the top being see through. I chose to use a long half slip on the bottom. There is some see-through on the bottom. The slip solvea this, but the pockets (yes, it has pockets!) are a bit visible through. My dress is the solid yellow... darker of patterned fabrics may not have this issue. I'm as pale as you can get. Skin tone and choice on undergarments may impact the see-through issue. Overall, a nice dress for the price. Read more
items.author: Kindle Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Royal Blue Print, 001-black, Red & Black Stripes, Black Print, 003-navy Flower, Black Sakura, Red, Red Snow Print, Pink, White, Purple, 004-green, D-blue Flower, Red Plaid. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
